episodes.title: Kikyô
episodes.plot: Naruto returns to Konoha after a two-and-a-half-year training journey with Jiraiya and is reunited with Sakura.

episodes.title: Akatsuki, shidô
episodes.plot: Kakashi gives Naruto and Sakura a test to see how far they had improved. Meanwhile, two Akatsuki members, Deidara and Sasori, arrive at the entrance of the Sunagakure to capture the One-Tailed Shukaku's host, Gaara.

episodes.title: Shûgyô no seika
episodes.plot: Sakura and Naruto both demonstrate their newly acquired skills. Meanwhile, Deidara commences his attack on Sunagakure and is confronted by Gaara.

episodes.title: Suna no jinchûriki
episodes.plot: Gaara is quick to detect Deidara's presence, and an aerial battle ensues with Deidara on his giant bird and Gaara atop sand.

episodes.title: Kazekage to shite...!
episodes.plot: Naruto and Sakura defeat Kakashi in the survival challenge. Tsunade assigns them to a three-man squad led by Kakashi, who tells them they are now his equals.

episodes.title: Noruma kuriâ
episodes.plot: In order to protect his village from Deidara's explosive clay, Gaara uses his chakra to create a giant sand shield.

episodes.title: Shissôre Kankurô
episodes.plot: Gaara, his strength completely exhausted, is whisked away by Deidara. Kankuro ignores Baki's efforts to stop him and immediately sets out in pursuit with a platoon to rescue Gaara.

episodes.title: Shutsugeki, Kakashi han
episodes.plot: On her way to the Sand Village, Temari encounters Kakashi and his team. Kakashi admonishes Naruto when he tries to rush ahead...

episodes.title: Jinchûriki no namida
episodes.plot: An urgent message from the Sand Village detailing the Akatsuki's kidnapping of the Kazekage reaches the Hidden Leaf Village. Tsunade wastes no time in ordering Team Kakashi to the Sand Village.

episodes.title: Fûinjutsu: Genryû kyû fûjin
episodes.plot: The Sand ninja fight against time to treat Kankuro. Even the Sand's poison expert, Granny Chiyo, is baffled. The only hope lies with the reinforcements sent by Tsunade.

episodes.title: Iryô ninja no deshi
episodes.plot: Sakura treats a critically ill Kankuro. After extensive training she's now a full-fledged Medic Ninja, and Sakura amazes everyone with her sure, steady hands.

episodes.title: Inkyo babâ no ketsui
episodes.plot: Pakkun finds the hideout of the Akatsuki. Team Kakashi and Temari prepare to set out to get Gaara back, but Temari is ordered to stay behind and help guard the village.

episodes.title: In'nen a ima mieru
episodes.plot: Team Kakashi encounter Itachi Uchiha, who had dealt them a bitter defeat in the past. Kakashi warns everyone not to look into Itachi's Sharingan Eyes.

episodes.title: Naruto no seichô
episodes.plot: Guy prepares to use a forbidden secret jutsu. Meanwhile, Naruto falls under Itachi's genjutsu, and all the anti-genjutsu training he underwent with Jiraiya races through Naruto's mind.

episodes.title: Kakushi dama nazukete...!
episodes.plot: Granny Chiyo and Sakura rescue Naruto from Itachi's genjutsu. Without a moment's delay, Kakashi begins a counterattack.

episodes.title: Ugokidasu monotachi
episodes.plot: After hunting down the Four Tails, Itachi and Kisame are summoned by the leader of the Akatsuki. The leader announces the death of Orochimaru to the gathered members and the possibility of his killer, Sasuke, setting his sights on the Akatsuki organization....

episodes.title: Tansaku
episodes.plot: Under Kakashi's command, the Leaf ninja set off to find Itachi. Using Kakashi's ninja hounds, they gather as much information as they can on Itachi. Meanwhile, the members of the Hebi also scatter to look for information on Itachi. Led by the ninja hound tracking Sasuke's scent, Sakura arrives in town and draws near to Karin.

episodes.title: Gekitotsu!
episodes.plot: Upon encountering one another, Sasuke and Deidara engage in battle. After exchanging a few blows to test Sasuke's strength, Deidara conjures up his specialty clay dragon and wages long-range attacks against Sasuke from high above. With Tobi's backup support, the battle seems to be going to Deidara.

episodes.title: Geijutsu
episodes.plot: Determined to destroy the Sharingan to rid himself of the taste of defeat he received from Itachi, Deidara unleashes his biggest attack, the C4 Karura. Created to kill Itachi, this fierce weapon is capable of destroying living beings from the inside using millions of nano-sized bombs. Can Sasuke escape this attack fueled by Deidara's determination to destroy the Sharingan?

episodes.title: Shôshitsu
episodes.plot: Sasuke goes missing after being caught by Deidara's suicidal bombing. Sensing his disappearance, Jugo, Karin, and Suigetsu race to Sasuke's last location, where the three Hebi members discover...?

episodes.title: Tasogare
episodes.plot: Leaf ninja, she notifies the others and the Hebi members quickly leave the inn. To allow Sasuke to focus on his coming battle with Itachi, Karin comes up with a plan to keep the Leaf ninja occupied.

episodes.title: Dokonjô ninden ~ Jiraiya ninpôchô ~ Zenpen
episodes.plot: During the reign of the Second Hokage, the young Jiraiya, Orochimaru, and Tsunade are assigned to Hiruzen Sarutobi's platoon as Genins. While training, Jiraiya accidentally transports himself to Mount Myoboku, opening the path to fulfill his destiny.

episodes.title: Dokonjô ninden ~ Jiraiya ninpôchô ~ Kôhen
episodes.plot: Jiraiya's journey to seek out a student is postponed due to the outbreak of the Third Great Ninja War. Jiraiya joins Tsunade and Orochimaru to battle the Village Hidden in the Rain.

episodes.title: Sen'nyû! Amegakure no sato
episodes.plot: Jiraiya successfully infiltrates the Hidden Rain Village by hiding inside the toad Gamagoro. He sets out to gather information but finds no indications of a civil war occurring within the village.

episodes.title: Kami to natta otoko
episodes.plot: Foreseeing a possible battle, Jiraiya takes precautionary measures by storage releasing the scroll toad that commands the key to Naruto's Eight-Signed Seal.

episodes.title: Hatsudô! Sen'nin modô
episodes.plot: Jiraiya battles to defeat his former student Pain, who is now driven by his twisted ideals as an Akatsuki member.

episodes.title: Pein rokudô, kenzan
episodes.plot: Jiraiya completes his Sage Mode transformation to battle the three Pains.

episodes.title: The Tale of Jiraiya the Gallant
episodes.plot: Having lost his arm, Jiraiya is outmatched by the six Pains now appearing before him. Of the six, the one called Tendo is revealed to be Jiraiya's former student Yahiko. Jiraiya is still puzzled by the Rinnegan's true powers, but before he can gather his thoughts, he is forced back into battle.

episodes.title: Utage e no sasoi
episodes.plot: As Sasuke proceeds to Itachi's hideout, Tobi messes with Naruto.

episodes.title: Nagaki toki no naka de...
episodes.plot: While Itachi waits for Sasuke in the Uchiha hideout, he recalls the past incident that led to his defection from the Leaf Village. When Sasuke arrives, the fated battle begins between the two brothers.

episodes.title: Mangekyô Sharingan no hikari to yami
episodes.plot: Following their fierce genjutsu battle with the Sharingan, Itachi explains the secret behind the most powerful ocular jutsu, the Mangekyo Sharingan, and the history of the Uchiha clan...

episodes.title: Amaterasu
episodes.plot: Sasuke loses his left eye to Itachi, but it turns out to be a genjutsu created by the Mangekyo Sharingan. Breaking free of the Tsukuyomi by force, Sasuke makes a furious comeback against the injured Itachi.

episodes.title: Shûen
episodes.plot: At the climax of the battle, both Itachi and Sasuke run out of chakra. However, Sasuke reveals that his actions up until now were only a preparation for his final jutsu.

episodes.title: Tobi no nazo
episodes.plot: Naruto and his comrades find themselves held up by Tobi, whose strange jutsu is more than just a simple genjutsu.

episodes.title: In'nen
episodes.plot: In the Akatsuki hideout Sasuke comes face to face with Madara. Announcing himself as Itachi's accomplice from that fateful night, Madara goes on to tell Sasuke the truth about Itachi that he could never have known.

episodes.title: Shinjitsu
episodes.plot: The Uchiha clan was plotting a coup d'etat. The story as told by Madara leaves Sasuke at a loss for words. Because of his gifted talent, Itachi was forced to suffer, torn between his loyalties to the Leaf Village and the Uchiha clan.
